title: game doesnt work but launcher does
body: when i am trying to play league on my new computer i can launch the launcher and everything works great but when i got to launch a match it says my internet cpnnection needs to be checked and kicks me can anyone help me with this?

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like your network is able to communicate with the client just fine, but isn't able to get a clear signal with the actual game servers you would be playing on. Let's update your port forwarding and DNS settings really quick since those usually have good luck getting this kind of problem smoothed out. If you aren't sure how to adjust those settings, follow the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some basic troubleshooting.
